name: Equilibrium VR
description: In this magic game you will lead an eagle and fly over the snowy peaks in the mountains, accompanied by a delightful music.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590/AMD FX™ 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 170 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
